parameters.query: INSERT INTO conversations (session_id, title, status) VALUES ('{{ $json.sessionId }}', '{{ $json.title.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', 'active') RETURNING id, session_id, title
INSERT INTO messages (conversation_id, role, content) VALUES ('{{ $json.conversationId }}'::uuid, 'user', '{{ $json.message.replace(/'/g, "''") }}') RETURNING id
INSERT INTO activity_log (message_id, activity_type, content, duration_ms) VALUES ('{{ $json.userMessageId }}'::uuid, 'thinking', 'Analyzing request and preparing debate...', 0)

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ action: 'sendMessage', chatInput: $('ğŸ“‹ Prep for Debate').first().json.message, sessionId: $('ğŸ“‹ Prep for Debate').first().json.sessionId }) }}

parameters.query: INSERT INTO messages (conversation_id, role, content) VALUES ('{{ $json.conversationId }}'::uuid, 'assistant', '{{ $json.output.replace(/'/g, "''").replace(/\\/g, '\\\\') }}') RETURNING id

UPDATE conversations SET title = '{{ $json.title.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', consensus_score = {{ $json.consensus }}, total_rounds = {{ $json.rounds }}, total_decisions = {{ $json.decisions }}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = '{{ $json.conversationId }}'::uuid

INSERT INTO sources (message_id, model_name, model_icon, model_role, contribution) VALUES ('{{ $json.messageId }}'::uuid, '{{ $json.model_name }}', '{{ $json.model_icon }}', '{{ $json.model_role }}', '{{ $json.contribution.replace(/'/g, "''") }}')

parameters.content:
## ğŸ’¬ AI Debate - Chat API

This workflow handles the main chat endpoint:

### Flow:
1. Receive POST to `/ai-debate-chat`
2. Create conversation if new
3. Save user message to DB
4. Call the debate workflow
5. Parse response and extract stats
6. Save assistant message and sources
7. Return enhanced response with sources/activity

### Request Format:
```json
{
  "message": "Topic to debate",
  "sessionId": "optional-session-id",
  "conversationId": "optional-uuid"
}
```

### Response Format:
```json
{
  "conversation_id": "uuid",
  "title": "Topic Title",
  "output": "Debate response...",
  "sources": [...],
  "activity": [...],
  "stats": { "consensus": 85, "rounds": 2, "decisions": 3 }
}
```
